docs.snippet: “All along, I’ve proven to be right,” the president-elect told reporters, speaking of the truck rampage that killed 12 and injured dozens....
docs.lead_paragraph: “All along, I’ve proven to be right,” the president-elect told reporters, speaking of the truck rampage that killed 12 and injured dozens.
docs.abstract: Donald Trump appears to suggest truck attack in Berlin vindicates his plans to bar Muslims from entering United States; cryptic remarks made to reporters leave room for interpretation, but aide Jason Miller states Trump's comments refer to his intent to suspend immigrants from countries with high terrorist activity.

headline.main: Trump Suggests Berlin Attack Affirms His Plan to Bar Muslims
headline.print_headline: Trump Suggests Berlin Rampage Affirms His Plan to Bar Muslims

docs.snippet: A hacking group linked to the Russian government and high-profile cyber attacks against Democrats during the U.S. presidential election likely used a malware implant on Android devices to track and target Ukrainian artillery units from late 2014 t...
docs.lead_paragraph: A hacking group linked to the Russian government and high-profile cyber attacks against Democrats during the U.S. presidential election likely used a malware implant on Android devices to track and target Ukrainian artillery units from late 2014 through 2016, according to a new report released Thursday.

headline.main: Russian Hackers Tracked Ukrainian Artillery Units Using Android Implant: Report
headline.print_headline: Russian Hackers Tracked Ukrainian Artillery Units Using Android Implant: Report
